DerivativeNotionalAmount.label: Derivative, Notional Amount
DerivativeNotionalAmount.description: Aggregate notional amount specified by the derivative(s). Expressed as an absolute value.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Exercise Price of Warrants or Rights (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.description: Exercise price per share or per unit of warrants or rights outstanding.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Outstanding
ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.description: Number of warrants or rights outstanding.

CommunicationsAndInformationTechnology.label: Communications and Information Technology
CommunicationsAndInformationTechnology.description: The amount of expense in the period for communications and data processing expense.

DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Compensation Expense
DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.description: The compensation expense recognized during the period pertaining to the deferred compensation arrangement.

DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Fair Value of Shares Issued
DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.description: The total fair value of shares issued during the period under a deferred compensation arrangement.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureEmployer.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Employer Contributions, Next Fiscal Year
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureEmployer.description: Amount of contribution expected to be received by defined benefit plan from employer in next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlanServiceCost.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Service Cost
DefinedBenefitPlanServiceCost.description: Amount of cost for actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.label: Defined Benefit Plans, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.description: Amount of employer's best estimate of contributions expected to be paid to the plan during the next fiscal year beginning after the date of the latest statement of financial position.

DefinedBenefitPlanUltimateHealthCareCost.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Ultimate Health Care Cost Trend Rate (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanUltimateHealthCareCost.description: The ultimate trend rate for health care costs.

DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost
DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.description: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit for recognition of expense of award under share-based payment arrangement.

FutureAmortizationExpenseYearFive.label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Five (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FutureAmortizationExpenseYearFive.description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year five of the five succeeding fiscal years.

FutureAmortizationExpenseYearFour.label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Four (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FutureAmortizationExpenseYearFour.description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year four of the five succeeding fiscal years.

FutureAmortizationExpenseYearOne.label: Future Amortization Expense, Year One (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FutureAmortizationExpenseYearOne.description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year one of the five succeeding fiscal years.

FutureAmortizationExpenseYearThree.label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Three (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FutureAmortizationExpenseYearThree.description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year three of the five succeeding fiscal years.

FutureAmortizationExpenseYearTwo.label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Two (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FutureAmortizationExpenseYearTwo.description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year two of the five succeeding fiscal years.

MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

QuantifyingMisstatementInCurrentYearFina.label: Quantifying Misstatement in Current Year Financial Statements, Amount
QuantifyingMisstatementInCurrentYearFina.description: Amount of each individual error being corrected in the correcting adjustment.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Discount from Market Price (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: An entity may opt to disclose the discount rate from market value on offering date or purchase date that participants pay for shares. Typically, the participant's per share cost is the lower of the prices on the two dates.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Discount from Market Price, Offering Date
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Discount rate from fair value on offering date that participants pay for shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of accumulated difference between fair value of underlying shares on dates of exercise and exercise price on options exercised (or share units converted) into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average grant-date fair value of options granted during the reporting period as calculated by applying the disclosed option pricing methodology.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Intrinsic Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of difference between fair value of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise price of vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable.

SignificantChangeInUnrecognizedTaxBenefi.label: Significant Change in Unrecognized Tax Benefits is Reasonably Possible, Amount of Unrecorded Benefit
SignificantChangeInUnrecognizedTaxBenefi.description: The amount of the unrecognized tax benefit of a position taken for which it is reasonably possible that the total amount thereof will significantly increase or decrease within twelve months of the balance sheet date.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Acquisition
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from acquisitions.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.
